Title: Bibliographic ontology specification
Description: Describing  citations and bibliographic references (including quotes, books and articles)

Title: An ontology of scientific experiments
Description: Ontology for describing scientific experiments, including the design, methodology and results

Title: ScholOnto: an ontology-based digital library server for research documents and discourse
Description: For scholarly interpretation and discourse. Describe debate and relations to the literature

Title: The Publishing Workflow Ontology (PWO)
Description: Used for describing the workflow steps for the publication of a document

Title: The Document Components Ontology (DoCO)
Description: For document structure (paragraph, chapter etc.) and rhetorical elements (introduction, discussion)

Title: The SPAR Ontologies
Description: Can record the status for the publication of a document (draft, submitted etc.)

Title: The SPAR Ontologies
Description: For describing the different roles in the publication process (authors, editors, reviewers etc.)

Title: The SPAR Ontologies
Full name: Citation Counting and Context Characterisation Ontology
Description: Recording of in-text citations including their textual citation context

Title: FaBiO and CiTO: Ontologies for describing bibliographic resources and citations
Description: For describing citations, both factually and rhetorically

Title: FaBiO and CiTO: Ontologies for describing bibliographic resources and citations
Description: Describing entities that can be published (e.g., papers). Focus on bibliographic references
